mapper.select: select cc.catname from contentscate cc,contents con where cc.catcode = con.catcode and cc.catid = con.catid and con.contentsid= #{contentsId}
mapper.insert: insert into picklist(contentsid, userid, wanna, distence) values (#{contentsid},#{userId},0,0)
mapper.delete: delete from picklist where contentsid = #{contentsid} and userid = #{userId}
